root@537b5733ad6d:/app# pip show fasttext; tmux wait -S done
Name: fasttext
Version: 0.9.3
Summary: fasttext Python bindings
Home-page: https://github.com/facebookresearch/fastText
Author: Onur Celebi
Author-email: celebio@fb.com
License: MIT
Location: /usr/local/lib/python3.13/site-packages
Requires: numpy, pybind11, setuptools
Required-by:
root@537b5733ad6d:/app# pip list | grep fasttext; tmux wait -S done
fasttext   0.9.3
root@537b5733ad6d:/app#

{"state_analysis":"The fasttext package is installed and the version is 0.9.3. Since the package is installed correctly, the issue may be related to dependencies or the Python environment configuration. We should check if the required dependencies are installed and whether there are any conflicting packages.","explanation":"The next commands will check if the required dependencies (numpy, pybind11, setuptools) are installed and their versions to ensure compatibility with fasttext.","commands":[{"keystrokes":"pip show numpy
","is_blocking":true,"timeout_sec":10},{"keystrokes":"pip show pybind11
","is_blocking":true,"timeout_sec":10},{"keystrokes":"pip show setuptools
","is_blocking":true,"timeout_sec":10}],"is_task_complete":false}

Additionally, the version of setuptools is quite old and could potentially cause compatibility issues with other packages.","explanation":"We will check the version of numpy to ensure it is installed correctly. keystrokes.description: Keystrokes to execute in the terminal. Use tmux-style escape sequences for modifier keys (e.g. C-c for ctrl-c). Modifier keys must be sent as their own commands otherwise the characters will be interpreted literally.
keystrokes.title: Keystrokes

is_blocking.description: Whether to wait for and return the terminal output after executing these keystrokes. This will append '; tmux wait -S done' to your command.DO NOT block on modifier keys or inside interactive programs (e.g. vim or less). Only block when the command is executed in the command line, is not interactive, and you expect the output to be returned with no intervention. When in doubt, wait instead of blocking.
is_blocking.title: Is Blocking

timeout_sec.description: The number of expected seconds to wait for the command to complete.
timeout_sec.title: Timeout Sec

state_analysis.description: Description of the current state of the terminal
state_analysis.title: State Analysis

explanation.description: Brief explanation of what these commands will do
explanation.title: Explanation

commands.description: List of shell interactions to execute in the Docker container
commands.title: Commands

is_task_complete.description: Whether the task is complete following the execution of these commands. Make sure to check that the command you last executed worked before saying you're done.
is_task_complete.title: Is Task Complete

root@537b5733ad6d:/app# pip show fasttext; tmux wait -S done
Name: fasttext
Version: 0.9.3
Summary: fasttext Python bindings
Home-page: https://github.com/facebookresearch/fastText
Author: Onur Celebi
Author-email: celebio@fb.com
License: MIT
Location: /usr/local/lib/python3.13/site-packages
Requires: numpy, pybind11, setuptools
Required-by:
root@537b5733ad6d:/app# pip list | grep fasttext; tmux wait -S done
fasttext   0.9.3
root@537b5733ad6d:/app#

{"state_analysis":"The fasttext package is installed and the version is 0.9.3. Since the package is installed correctly, the issue may be related to dependencies or the Python environment configuration. We should check if the required dependencies are installed and whether there are any conflicting packages.","explanation":"The next commands will check if the required dependencies (numpy, pybind11, setuptools) are installed and their versions to ensure compatibility with fasttext.","commands":[{"keystrokes":"pip show numpy
","is_blocking":true,"timeout_sec":10},{"keystrokes":"pip show pybind11
","is_blocking":true,"timeout_sec":10},{"keystrokes":"pip show setuptools
","is_blocking":true,"timeout_sec":10}],"is_task_complete":false}

However, the version of numpy was not printed, which might indicate an issue with its installation. Additionally, the version of setuptools is quite old and could potentially cause compatibility issues with other packages.","explanation":"We will check the version of numpy to ensure it is installed correctly. Then, if everything is fine, we may consider upgrading setuptools to a more recent version to avoid potential compatibility issues.","commands":[{"keystrokes":"pip show numpy\n","is_blocking":true,"timeout_sec":10},{"keystrokes":"pip install --upgrade setuptools\n","is_blocking":true,"timeout_sec":10}],"is_task_complete":false}

keystrokes.description: Keystrokes to execute in the terminal. Use tmux-style escape sequences for modifier keys (e.g. C-c for ctrl-c). Modifier keys must be sent as their own commands otherwise the characters will be interpreted literally.
keystrokes.title: Keystrokes

is_blocking.description: Whether to wait for and return the terminal output after executing these keystrokes. This will append '; tmux wait -S done' to your command.DO NOT block on modifier keys or inside interactive programs (e.g. vim or less). Only block when the command is executed in the command line, is not interactive, and you expect the output to be returned with no intervention. When in doubt, wait instead of blocking.
